0.text: Innate: Braum's basic attacks and  Winter's Bite each apply a Concussive Blows stack to their target for 4 seconds, stacking up to 4 times, refreshing with each application. Once the first stack has been applied, any allied  champion's basic attack applies an additional stack to the target  on-hit.
0.html: Innate: Braum's basic attacks and Winter's Bite each apply a Concussive Blows stack to their target for 4 seconds, stacking up to 4 times, refreshing with each application. Once the first stack has been applied, any allied champion's basic attack applies an additional stack to the target on-hit.

1.text: Upon applying 4 stacks to a target, Concussive Blows is consumed to deal 26 − 196 (based on level) magic damage and  stun them for 1.25 − 1.75 (based on level) seconds.
1.html: Upon applying 4 stacks to a target, Concussive Blows is consumed to deal 26 − 196 (based on level) magic damage and stun them for 1.25 − 1.75 (based on level) seconds.

2.text: This effect cannot apply to the same target more than once every few seconds. During this immunity period, affected targets take「 20% of the trigger damage as bonus magic damage 」「 5.2 − 39.2 (based on level) bonus magic damage 」from Braum's basic attacks.
2.html: This effect cannot apply to the same target more than once every few seconds. During this immunity period, affected targets take「 20% of the trigger damage as bonus magic damage 」「 5.2 − 39.2 (based on level) bonus magic damage 」from Braum's basic attacks.

0.text: Active: Braum propels ice from his shield in the target direction, dealing magic damage to the first enemy hit and  slowing them by 70% decaying over 2 seconds.
0.html: Active: Braum propels ice from his shield in the target direction, dealing magic damage to the first enemy hit and slowing them by 70% decaying over 2 seconds.

0.text: Active: Braum  dashes to put himself between the target ally and the closest  visible enemy  champion within 1500 units, and upon arrival grants himself and the ally  bonus armor and  bonus magic resistance for 3 seconds.
0.html: Active: Braum dashes to put himself between the target ally and the closest visible enemy champion within 1500 units, and upon arrival grants himself and the ally  bonus armor and  bonus magic resistance for 3 seconds.

1.text: Stand Behind Me can be self cast to instantly grant Braum the bonus resistances.
1.html: Stand Behind Me can be self cast to instantly grant Braum the bonus resistances.

2.text: Unbreakable can be cast during the dash.
2.html: Unbreakable can be cast during the dash.

0.text: Active: Braum sets his shield in the target direction for a few seconds, creating a barrier that intercepts all incoming hostile  projectiles and  reduces the damage Braum takes through it. The first instance of damage dealt by a  champion from this direction is reduced by 100%. Unbreakable does not affect  turrets.
0.html: Active: Braum sets his shield in the target direction for a few seconds, creating a barrier that intercepts all incoming hostile projectiles and reduces the damage Braum takes through it. The first instance of damage dealt by a champion from this direction is reduced by 100%. Unbreakable does not affect turrets.

1.text: While his shield is raised, Braum also gains  10% bonus movement speed and  ghosting.
1.html: While his shield is raised, Braum also gains  10% bonus movement speed and ghosting.

0.text: Active: Braum leaps into the air and slams his shield into the ground, creating a fissure that travels forth in the target direction, dealing magic damage to enemies within its path as well as those around Braum.
0.html: Active: Braum leaps into the air and slams his shield into the ground, creating a fissure that travels forth in the target direction, dealing magic damage to enemies within its path as well as those around Braum.

1.text: The first target hit is  knocked up for at least 0.3 seconds, increased if they are further away from Braum. All other enemies hit are  knocked up for 0.3 seconds.
1.html: The first target hit is knocked up for at least 0.3 seconds, increased if they are further away from Braum. All other enemies hit are knocked up for 0.3 seconds.

2.text: A field of ice is created along the fissure's path, lasting for 4 seconds and  slowing enemies within the area every 0.25 seconds. The field disappears after the duration ends in the same order and speed it was created with.
2.html: A field of ice is created along the fissure's path, lasting for 4 seconds and slowing enemies within the area every 0.25 seconds. The field disappears after the duration ends in the same order and speed it was created with.

consume.originHTML:
Active

Unique – Trinket: Consume a charge to place an invisible Totem Ward at the target location, which grants sight of the surrounding area for 90 − 120 (based on average of all champion levels) seconds (240 − 120 (based on average of all champion levels) seconds recharge time; 2 charges; 600 range).
consume.originText: UNIQUE – TRINKET: Consume a charge to place an invisible  Totem Ward at the target location, which grants  sight of the surrounding area for 90 − 120 (based on average of all champion levels) seconds (240 − 120 (based on average of all champion levels) seconds recharge time; 2 charges; 600 range).

stats.originHTML:
Stats

+3 attack damage
+30 health
+25% base health regeneration
+ 2 per 10 seconds

passive.originHTML:
Passive

Unique – Spoils of War: Grants a charge every 35 seconds, up to 3 charges. Basic attacks can consume a charge to execute minions. Basic attacks execute minions below ( 50% / 30%) of their maximum health. Killing a minion by any means with a charge grants you and the nearest allied champion kill gold. These effects require an allied champion to be nearby. Receive diminishing gold from excessive minion kills.
Unique – Quest: Earn 500 using this item to upgrade to Runesteel Spaulders, gaining the Warding active with 3 wards in stock.
passive.originText: UNIQUE – SPOILS OF WAR: Grants a charge every 35 seconds, up to 3 charges. Basic attacks can consume a charge to execute minions. Basic attacks  execute minions below ( 50% /  30%) of their maximum health. Killing a minion by any means with a charge grants you and the nearest allied champion kill  gold. These effects require an allied champion to be nearby. Receive diminishing gold from excessive minion kills.

active.originHTML:
Active

Unique – Devotion: Grant allied champions within 850 radius a shield for 180 − 330 (based on target's level), decaying over 2.5 seconds (90 second cooldown).
active.originText: UNIQUE – DEVOTION: Grant allied champions within  850 radius a  shield for 180 − 330 (based on target's level), decaying over 2.5 seconds (90 second cooldown).

passive.originHTML:
Passive

Unique – Consecrate: Grant allied champions within 850 radius 3 bonus armor and 3 bonus magic resistance.
Mythic Passive: Empowers each of your other Legendary items with 2 bonus resistances for this item's passive effect, Consecrate.
passive.originText: UNIQUE – CONSECRATE: Grant allied champions within 850 radius 3 bonus armor and 3 bonus magic resistance.

1.originHTML: +  +  300

stats.originHTML:
Stats

+20 ability haste
+400 health
+200% base health regeneration

active.originHTML:
Active

Unique – Pledge: Designate an allied champion as Worthy, forming a tether between you and them. Champions can only be designated as Worthy by one Knight's Vow at a time (60 second cooldown).
active.originText: UNIQUE – PLEDGE: Designate an allied champion as Worthy, forming a  tether between you and them. Champions can only be designated as Worthy by one Knight's Vow at a time (60 second cooldown).

passive.originHTML:
Passive

Unique – Sacrifice: While your Worthy ally is nearby and you are above 30% of your maximum health, redirect 10% of the post-mitigation physical and magic damage they take to you as true damage and heal for 7% of the damage dealt by your Worthy ally to champions. If they are below 30% maximum health, the damage redirection is increased to 20%.
passive.originText: UNIQUE – SACRIFICE: While your Worthy ally is nearby and you are above 30% of your maximum health, redirect 10% of the post-mitigation physical and magic damage they take to you as true damage and  heal for 7% of the damage dealt by your Worthy ally to champions. If they are below 30% maximum health, the damage redirection is increased to 20%.

active.originHTML:
Active

Unique – Conduit: Designate an allied champion as the Accomplice, forming a tether between you and them. Champions can only be designated as the Accomplice by one Zeke's Convergence at a time (60 second cooldown).
active.originText: UNIQUE – CONDUIT: Designate an allied champion as the Accomplice, forming a  tether between you and them. Champions can only be designated as the Accomplice by one Zeke's Convergence at a time (60 second cooldown).

passive.originHTML:
Passive

Unique – Convergence: Immobilizing enemy champions marks them for 8 seconds. Your Accomplice's basic attacks on-hit and ability hits against marked enemies fire a missile at them that deals them 30 − 70 (based on level) (+ 7.5% AP) (+ 1.5% maximum health) bonus magic damage upon arrival.
passive.originText: UNIQUE – CONVERGENCE:  Immobilizing enemy champions marks them for 8 seconds. Your Accomplice's basic attacks on-hit and ability hits against marked enemies fire a missile at them that deals them 30 − 70 (based on level) (+ 7.5% AP) (+ 1.5% maximum health) bonus magic damage upon arrival.

passive.originHTML:
Passive

Unique – Thorns: When struck by a basic attack on-hit, deal 10 (+ 20% bonus armor) magic damage to the attacker and, if they are a champion, inflict them with 25% Grievous Wounds for 3 seconds. Immobilizing enemy champions also inflicts them with 40% Grievous Wounds for 3 seconds.
passive.originText: UNIQUE – THORNS: When struck by a basic attack on-hit, deal 10 (+ 20% bonus armor) magic damage to the attacker and, if they are a champion, inflict them with 25%  Grievous Wounds for 3 seconds.  Immobilizing enemy champions also inflicts them with 40%  Grievous Wounds for 3 seconds.

st_flatStats1.concerningText: Active: Braum  dashes to put himself between the target ally and the closest  visible enemy  champion within 1500 units, and upon arrival grants himself and the ally  bonus armor and  bonus magic resistance for 3 seconds.

st_flatStats0.concerningText: Stand Behind Me can be self cast to instantly grant Braum the bonus resistances.

st_flatStats1.concerningText: Stand Behind Me can be self cast to instantly grant Braum the bonus resistances.

st_flatStats0.concerningText: Active: Braum sets his shield in the target direction for a few seconds, creating a barrier that intercepts all incoming hostile  projectiles and  reduces the damage Braum takes through it. The first instance of damage dealt by a  champion from this direction is reduced by 100%. Unbreakable does not affect  turrets.
The first target hit is  knocked up for at least 0.3 seconds, increased if they are further away from Braum. All other enemies hit are  knocked up for 0.3 seconds.

A field of ice is created along the fissure's path, lasting for 4 seconds and  slowing enemies within the area every 0.25 seconds. The field disappears after the duration ends in the same order and speed it was created with.
Active: Braum propels ice from his shield in the target direction, dealing magic damage to the first enemy hit and  slowing them by 70% decaying over 2 seconds.
